Title: MicroStar Particle System
Description: MicroStar is a 2D particle system created in XNA 3.1 and is intended to make adding cool visual effects to XNA games simple and easy to do.
HomeWiki:
MicroStar is a 2D particle system written in XNA 4 for Windows, Windows Phone 7 and Xbox 360.

See Particle Effect Examples page for videos of the MicroStar particle system in action.

Possible Future Additions

  • Support for 3D
  • Providing functionality for Windows Phone 7 touch and accelerometer functionality.
  • More samples ﻿

This project is no longer being maintain on CodePlex.  See updated version which works with MonoGame on GitHub at: https://github.com/jasonmitchell/supernova
